modName: CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Racemenu Preset
summary: CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned RaceMenu Preset. Age and scars can be beautiful as well!
descriptionHtml:
CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned RaceMenu Preset. Age and scars can be beautiful as well!
This is just simply a RaceMenu Preset for my newest character named Ygritte Snow-Crowned. Ygritte is an older nord lady who has aged well and survived more than a few battles.

[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430165301.png[/img][/center]

Requirements :
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.7.2
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu 3.0.0[/url]

If you want her to look exactly like the screen shots you'll also need these mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3397/?]More Realistic Hair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3574/?]Gizmodians Scars[/url]

You can find the armor in the screens here :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52711/?]Dragonbone Barbarian Armor[/url]

** You may have to use the showracemenu command and set the complexion slider with RaceMenu as I have noticed it does not want to stick. Or you can leave the complexion slider alone if you want a younger sexier version of Ygritte.

Permissions: You can do whatever you feel like with this mod, except make money.

My other mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57886/?]CD Female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Armor Fixes[/url] - Some fixes to the Female Ebonsteel Grand Helm and Boots
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63978/?]CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Follower[/url]Â  - My Ygritte Snow-Crowned character as a follower
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31129/?]CD Slower Werewolf Perk Points[/url] - Gain werewolf perk points at a slower rate
author: caldurham
